city.name: SILICON VALLEY
city.description: Silicon Valley is known as the cratle of innivation, it is where most well known top know Tech companies Originated. Big names like Google, Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Netflix and more...all reside at Silicon Valley. Silicon Valley is a region in Northern California that serves as a global center for high technology and innovation. It is located in the southern part of the San Francisco Bay Area
